column2: every morning at eleven minutes past seven he'd slam the door and rev the engine like he was starting a grand prix
column4: especially if I'd just come off nights.

column1:
0711|7:11 a.m.|7:11 a.m.
It could have been the sound of a single explosion
column2: even though it had taken place at the two opposite entries to Command. Then
column4: Team One and Team Three were inside
column5: just behind the harmless explosions of flash grenades and charges of CS they had blasted into the room.
